data.name: The Mill Blackbird VR Experience
data.detailed_description:
In collaboration with JemFX, Performance Filmworks and Keslow Camera, The Mill created The BLACKBIRD®, the first fully adjustable car rig that creates photoreal CG cars.

Until it’s launch, automotive content was often dictated or hampered by car availability, model revisions, limited access to locations and footage that can quickly become irrelevant.

The Mill BLACKBIRD® is able to quickly transform its chassis to match the exact length and width of almost any car. Powered by an electric motor, it can be programmed to imitate acceleration curves and gearing shifts and the adjustable suspension alters ride height, rigidity and dampening to replicate typical driving characteristics.

The Mill BLACKBIRD® VR Experience allows users to explore all of the configurable features of The BLACKBIRD®, allowing users to interact with the unique rig functions including the bespoke systems created by The Mill, used to capture light and reflection data.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7/8.1/10 (64-bit versions)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-6600K or AMD Ryzen 5 1400 or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Gefore GTX970 / AMD RX 480 8GB or better
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 or AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Geforce GTX1070 8GB / AMD RX Vega 56 8GB
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
